mapper.select: select w.week_name,grade_name, classes_name,lecturer_name,tutor_name,course_name, lt60/students_num lt60_rate, gt60_lt70/students_num gt60_lt70_rate, gt70_lt80/students_num gt70_lt80_rate, gt80_lt90/students_num gt80_lt90_rate, gt90_lt100/students_num gt90_lt100_rate from weekly_exam e,grade g, classes c, lecturer l, tutor t, course co, week w where e.classes_id = c.classes_id and e.lecturer_id = l.lecturer_id and e.tutor_id = t.tutor_id and e.course_id = co.course_id and e.week_id = w.week_id and g.grade_id = c.grade_id and term_id= #{termId} and e.week_id= #{weekId};

select g.grade_name, w.week_name, sum(students_num-lt60)/sum(students_num) rate from weekly_exam e, week w, classes c, grade g, lecturer l, tutor t where e.week_id = w.week_id and e.classes_id = c.classes_id and c.grade_id = g.grade_id and e.lecturer_id = l.lecturer_id and e.tutor_id = t.tutor_id and e.term_id = (select max(term_id) from weekly_exam) and e.week_id >= #{beginWeekId} and e.week_id < #{endWeekId} group by grade_name, week_name
select max(week_id) from weekly_exam where term_id = (select max(term_id) from weekly_exam);

select e.exam_id,e.course_id,e.classes_id,e.term_id,e.week_id,e.lecturer_id,e.tutor_id,g.grade_id, e.lt60,e.gt60_lt70,e.gt70_lt80,e.gt80_lt90,e.gt90_lt100, e.students_num,(e.students_num-e.lt60)/e.students_num rate, lt60/students_num lt60_rate, gt60_lt70/students_num gt60_lt70_rate, gt70_lt80/students_num gt70_lt80_rate, gt80_lt90/students_num gt80_lt90_rate, gt90_lt100/students_num gt90_lt100_rate, (e.students_num-e.lt60)/e.students_num rate, e.is_able,c.course_name,cls.classes_name,t.term_name,w.week_name,l.lecturer_name,tu.tutor_name,g.grade_name from weekly_exam e, course c,classes cls,term t,`week` w,lecturer l, tutor tu, grade g where e.course_id=c.course_id and e.classes_id=cls.classes_id and e.term_id=t.term_id and e.week_id=w.week_id and e.tutor_id=tu.tutor_id and e.lecturer_id=l.lecturer_id and cls.grade_id=g.grade_id and e.exam_id = #{examId}
